pageTitle: Study In Malaysia | Addmission Guide to Legenda Group of Colleges for Foreign Students
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {17151=Since 1998, many long established Malaysian private institutions of higher learning have gained confidence and trust from universities in countries like the United Kingdom, Australia, France and United States to allow these Malaysian private educational institutions to conduct the entire foreign university degree programmes in Malaysia. The qualification from these programmes will be awarded by the partner universities. Upon graduation, you could easily pursue your Master’s degree at the partner university overseas., 10276=The establishment of educational institutions in Malaysia and the courses offered will have to comply with legislative quality assurance requirements and the governing legislations such as the Education Act 1996, as well as the Private Higher Educational Institutions Act 1996., 2934=Malaysia’s rich culture not only exposes students to a value-added life, a global outlook and better understanding of different cultures, ethnic groups and traditions throughout the world but also provides a doorway to other parts of the ASEAN (Association of Southeast Asian Nations) region which consists of Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam, Myanmar, Laos, Cambodia, Philippines, Brunei Darussalam and Indonesia., 15955=Since 1998, 5 international reputable universities such as the Monash University from Australia, the University of Nottingham from the UK have set up their branch campuses in Malaysia offering exactly the same degrees as the main campus located overseas. By enrolling yourself in these branch campuses located in Malaysia, you are paying a much cheaper tuition fee in Ringgit Malaysia for an identical degree to the one from the main campus. Besides this, you may have the opportunity to spend one or more semesters at the main campus overseas with no disruption to your studies. For example, the tuition fee of a 3-year UK engineering degree is priced at about USD7600 per year in the Malaysian branch campus as compared to £12,000 (USD 22,300) per year in the UK main campus., 21540=There are more than 50,000 international students, in the beginning of year 2006, from many parts of the world attending international schools and pursuing tertiary courses ranging from diploma to degrees to PhD in private higher educational institutions and public universities in Malaysia. This signifies the confidence and acceptance of Malaysia as an international destination for acquiring academic qualifications.}
textBeforeTable: Cross Country Cost Comparison (Per Annum) The tuition fees and accommodation costs at Legenda are affordable.  A comparison of tuition fees and living expenses: Internationally recognised qualifications but delivered in Legenda Group of Colleges Malaysia that suit most of foreign students’ budget without compromising the quality of education. 3+0 degrees (where the entire University of East London (UEL) degrees programme is taught in Legenda). Unique collaborative bachelor’s degree programmes such as ‘2+1′ twinning degrees (for example: 2 years in Legenda and 1 year in overseas host universities). Higher National Diploma in various field as above approved by Edexcel International, UK Internal Diploma in Various fields such as Engineering, Built Environment, ICT, Business and Accounting. Qualifications are approved by Malaysian Qualifications Agency (MQA). textAfterTable: Note: These figures are estimates only and are subject to inflation and exchange rate fluctuations If you are interested to enroll in one of the colleges in Legenda Group of Colleges, please do not hesitate to contact me at the following contact details; HAMIDON ZAINI Education Facilitator Legenda Group of Colleges Hand phone: +6017-317 4880 email: hamidon_zaini@yahoo.com Comments : 1 Comment » Tags: 2+1 Bachelor's degree, 3+0 degree, BTEC Higher National Diploma, Internal Diploma Categories : Uncategorized A Warm WELCOME from Malaysia especially Legenda Group of Colleges 19 12 2007 A Warm WELCOME from Malaysia   Malaysia has years of experience with international students. Thus, most of the 200 odd private higher educational institutions, English language centres and the public universities have the experience to gladly welcome international students like YOU here. The International Student Offices in these institutions are accustomed to working with foreign students of various ethnic, culture and educational backgrounds. Therefore, international students are assured of support and attention during their studies here. Thus, by studying in Malaysia, international students will acquire the knowledge and skills needed to meet the demands of a global market as well as enjoy a comfortable and an enriching
